AsyncHBaseClientFactory - Class in storm.asynchbase.utils
A fully asynchronous, thread-safe, modern HBase client.
Unlike the traditional HBase client (HTable), this client should be instantiated only once.
You can use it with any number of tables at the same time.
The only case where you should have multiple instances is when you want to use multiple different clusters at the same time.
AsyncHBaseClientFactory() - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.utils.AsyncHBaseClientFactory
 
AsyncHBaseDeserializer - Interface in storm.asynchbase.utils
This interface represent a deserializer capable of returning a specific object type from a byte array fetched from HBase.
AsyncHBaseFieldMapper - Class in storm.asynchbase.bolt.mapper
This class configure an HBase RPC
It maps tuple fields to part of the request and sets options
AsyncHBaseFieldMapper() - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.bolt.mapper.AsyncHBaseFieldMapper
 
AsyncHBaseMapper - Class in storm.asynchbase.bolt.mapper

cacheSize : size of the LRU CachedMap timeout : timeout while doing multiget/multiput in milliseconds cluster : AsyncHBase client to use.

AsyncHBaseSerializer - Interface in storm.asynchbase.utils
This interface represent a serializer capable of returning a byte array from a specific object to be stored to from HBase.
AsyncHBaseState - Class in storm.asynchbase.trident.state
This is a TridentState implementation to persist a partition to HBase using AsyncHBase client.
You should only use this state if your update is idempotent regarding batch replay.
AsyncHBaseState(AsyncHBaseState.Options, Map) - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.trident.state.AsyncHBaseState
 
AsyncHBaseState.Options - Class in storm.asynchbase.trident.state
cluster : AsyncHBase client to use.

AsyncHBaseTridentExampleTopology - Class in storm.asynchbase.example.topology
This topology use Trident to insert random values in random columns of an HBase row.
Then it use DRPC to calculate the average value of the row, then it wipes the row.
There is also a DRPC counter using AtomicIncrement.
AsyncHBaseTridentExampleTopology() - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.example.topology.AsyncHBaseTridentExampleTopology
 
AsyncHBaseTridentFieldMapper - Class in storm.asynchbase.trident.mapper

AsyncHBaseTridentMapper() - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.trident.mapper.AsyncHBaseTridentMapper
 
AsyncHBaseTridentMapStateExampleTopology - Class in storm.asynchbase.example.topology
This topology use Trident sums up the random values emited by the spout for each key.
And then persisit it to HBase using AsyncHBaseMapState.
A DRPC query the state every second.
AsyncHBaseTridentMapStateExampleTopology() - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.example.topology.AsyncHBaseTridentMapStateExampleTopology
 
AsyncHBaseTridentStateExampleTopology - Class in storm.asynchbase.example.topology
This topology use Trident to compute the average stream rate over the last 2 seconds.
And then persisit it to HBase using AsyncHBaseState.
A DRPC query the state every second.
AsyncHBaseTridentStateExampleTopology() - Constructor for class storm.asynchbase.example.topology.AsyncHBaseTridentStateExampleTopology
